common.requestCookieText: We use essential cookies to make our site work. With your consent, we may also use non-essential cookies to improve user experience and analyze website traffic.
common.requestNotificationText: We would like to show you notifications for the latest news and updates
common.devModeNotice: This message above will be changed in production mode
common.prodModeNotice: We are crying and fixing this error :'(
common.internalError: We are not quite sure what went wrong. You can go back to the previous page or try contacting with us if you need a hand.
common.devInternalError: Server Internal Error. Please open console tab in devtools to check the error message.
common.pageNotFound: We can't seem to find the page you are looking for. Try going back to the previous page or try contacting with us if you need a hand.
